verses.verse: הִרְאַנִי֮ <WH7200> shewed יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> The LORD וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> behold שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> me and behold two דּוּדָאֵ֣י <WH1736> baskets תְאֵנִ֔ים <WH8384> of figs מוּעָדִ֕ים <WH3259> [were] set לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> the temple יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after הַגְל֣וֹת <WH1540> had carried away captive נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> that Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֡ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> יְכָנְיָ֣הוּ <WH3204> Jeconiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> and the princes יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH854> with הֶחָרָ֤שׁ <WH2796> with the carpenters וְאֶת־ <WH854> for הַמַּסְגֵּר֙ <WH4525> and smiths מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem וַיְבִאֵ֖ם <WH935> and had brought בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> them to Babylon

הַדּ֣וּד <WH1731> basket אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> One תְּאֵנִים֙ <WH8384> figs טֹב֣וֹת <WH2896> good מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> [had] very כִּתְאֵנֵ֖י <WH8384> [even] like the figs הַבַּכֻּר֑וֹת <WH1073> [that are] first ripe וְהַדּ֣וּד <WH1731> basket אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> and the other תְּאֵנִים֙ <WH8384> figs רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> naughty מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> [had] very אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> could תֵֽאָכַ֖לְנָה <WH398> which could not be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <WH7455> they were so bad ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> unto me What seest יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> said תְּאֵנִ֑ים <WH8384> Figs הַתְּאֵנִ֤ים <WH8384> figs הַטֹּבוֹת֙ <WH2896> the good טֹב֣וֹת <WH2896> good מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very וְהָֽרָעוֹת֙ <WH7451> and the evil רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> evil מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <WH398> that cannot be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <WH7455> they are so evil פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּתְּאֵנִ֥ים <WH8384> figs הַטֹּב֖וֹת <WH2896> Like these good הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> so אַכִּ֞יר <WH5234> so will I acknowledge אֶת־ <WH853> גָּל֣וּת <WH1546> them that are carried away captive יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom שִׁלַּ֜חְתִּי <WH7971> whom I have sent מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> out of this place הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> of this אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> into the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> for [their] good

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <WH7760> For I will set עֵינִ֤י <WH5869> mine eyes עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> upon לְטוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> upon them for good וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֖ים <WH7725> and I will bring them again עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> to this land הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> and I וּבְנִיתִים֙ <WH1129> and I will build וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <WH2040> them and not pull [them] down וּנְטַעְתִּ֖ים <WH5193> and I will plant וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not אֶתּֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH5428> them and not pluck [them] up

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <WH5414> And I will give לָהֶ֨ם לֵ֜ב <WH3820> them an heart לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> to know אֹתִ֗י <WH853> כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> me that I [am] the LORD וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֣י לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> and they shall be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <WH595> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> and I will be their God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> for they shall return אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me בְּכָל־ <WH3605> their whole לִבָּֽם׃ <WH3820> unto me with their whole heart ס

וְכַתְּאֵנִים֙ <WH8384> figs הָֽרָע֔וֹת <WH7451> And as the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <WH398> which cannot be eaten מֵרֹ֑עַ <WH7455> they are so evil כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> surely thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that אֶ֠תֵּן <WH5414> So will I give אֶת־ <WH853> צִדְקִיָּ֨הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרָיו֙ <WH8269> and his princes וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> and the residue יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <WH7604> that remain בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> who וְהַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> and them that dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וּנְתַתִּים֙ <WH5414> And I will deliver [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֣ה <WH2113> be removed ק) לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> for [their] hurt לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> into all the kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְחֶרְפָּ֤ה <WH2781> [to be] a reproach וּלְמָשָׁל֙ <WH4912> and a proverb לִשְׁנִינָ֣ה <WH8148> a taunt וְלִקְלָלָ֔ה <WH7045> and a curse בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <WH4725> in all places אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> I אַדִּיחֵ֥ם <WH5080> whither I shall drive שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וְשִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> And I will send בָ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the sword אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> the famine וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and the pestilence עַד־ <WH5704> until תֻּמָּם֙ <WH8552> among them till they be consumed מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> from off the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> and to וְלַאֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> unto them and to their fathers פ
